newsitem.title: USA: Nu-kote to realign, close some facilities.
newsitem.headline: Nu-kote to realign, close some facilities.

text.p: Nu-kote Holding Inc said on Thursday that it implemented a strategic realignment it said was intended to accelerate a return to profitability.

The company said the realignment would involve the following: the closing of certain manufacturing facilities; accelerating the shift of impact product production to Mexico and China; the re-defining the core product base.
Nu-kote said it would also focus on development resources on the most profitable non-impact product categories, eliminate unprofitable product categories, and strengthen its management team.
